attributes.action: Immedately reject any attempt to ban smoking in the street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We cannot smoke in office smoking rooms,
We cannot smoke in public buildings,
We cannot smoke on public transport,
We will not be allowed to smoke in pubs, clubs, cafes and restaurants.

We can only smoke in our own homes or on the streets.

If any ban or restriction on smoking in the streets and outside air is attempted  we will all be going to the European Court of Human Rights as you will be causing us all to be imprisioned in our own homes.

Reject all calls for further regulations regarding smoking. You cannot just keep on taking without giving replacement smoking areas
